config_path.description: This is the file path for Britive provider configuration. The default configuration path is ~/.britive/tf.config

tenant.description: This is the Britive Tenant URL

token.description: This is the API Token to interact with your Britive API

app_container_id.description: The identity of the Britive application

app_name.description: The name of the Britive application

description.description: The description of the Britive profile

expiration_duration.description: The expiration time for the Britive profile

extendable.description: The Boolean flag that indicates whether profile expiry is extendable or not

extension_duration.description: The profile expiry extension as a time value

extension_limit.description: The repetition limit for extending the profile expiry

name.description: The name of the Britive profile

notification_prior_to_expiration.description: he profile expiry notification as a time value

parent_name.description: The parent name of the resource. Required only if the association type is ApplicationResource

type.description: The type of association, should be one of [Environment, EnvironmentGroup, ApplicationResource]

block.description: The list of associations for the Britive profile

app_name.description: The name of the application, profile is assciated with

username.description: The identity associate with the profile

end.description: The end of the access period for the associated identity

start.description: The start of the access period for the associated identity

block.description: The access period for the associated identity

app_name.description: The application name of the application, profile is assciated with
The application name of the application, profile is assciated with

tag_name.description: The tag associate with the profile

end.description: The end of the access period for the associated tag

start.description: The start of the access period for the associated tag

block.description: The access period for the associated tag

description.description: The description of the Britive tag

external.description: The boolean attribute that indicates whether the tag is external or not

identity_provider_id.description: The unique identity of the identity provider associated with the Britive tag

tag_id.description: The identifier of the Britive tag

tag_name.description: The name of the Britive tag

username.description: The username of the user added to the Britive tag

name.description: The name of the identity provider
